channel.title: A suggestion and minor bug fix
channel.description:
First, could you allow players to select a default name? I use the same for each game and it's easy to miss the window for entering it in.
Second, the game crashes for me every time I 'x' out of the window. It's only a minor annoyance but it makes the game run up hours on Steam when I thought I was exited from it.
